author: @zazoomblog
title: Atletica oggi Diamond League Oslo 2025 | orari tv programma streaming azzurri in gara
text:
Atletica oggi Diamond League Oslo 2025 | orari tv programma streaming azzurri in gara
Preparati a vivere un'emozionante serata di atletica internazionale: oggi, gioved√É¬¨ 12 giugno, la Diamond League approda a Oslo, regalandoci un appuntamento imperdibile con le migliori stelle del circuito. Dalle ore 19.15, atleti di fama mondiale come Armand Duplantis si sfideranno in una cornice di altissimo livello tecnico e spettacolare. Scopri gli orari, il programma, lo streaming e i nostri azzurri in gara per non perdere nemmeno un istante di questa serata da ricordare.
Oggi gioved√É¬¨ 12 giugno (a partire dalle ore 19.15) va in scena la sesta tappa della Diamond League, il massimo circuito internazionale itinerante di atletica. Dopo il Golden Gala si resta in Europa per il tradizionale appuntamento di Oslo (Norvegia), teatro di una serata di indubbio spessore tecnico e altamente spettacolare vista la caratura dei tanti big che saranno impegnati in terra scandinava, a cominciare dallo svedese Armand Duplantis, primatista mondiale di salto con l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢asta. LA DIRETTA LIVE DELLA DIAMOND LEAGUE DI ATLETICA A OSLO DALLE 19.15 Saranno impegnati quattro italiani: Zaynab Dosso far√É il proprio debutto stagionale all√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢aperto, correndo i 100 metri dopo un inverno in cui ha conquistato l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢oro agli Europei e l√¢‚Ç¨‚Ñ¢argento ai Mondiali Indoor sui 60 metri; Filippo Tortu torner√É sui 200 metri dopo il 10.
[üîó Leggi su Oasport.it]
In questa notizia si parla di: atletica - diamond - league - oslo
Atletica, Tebogo passeggia in Diamond League. Sibilio vince, 4 world lead, che spallata di Weber - A Doha, in Qatar, la terza tappa della Diamond League ha brillato per emozioni e prestazioni straordinarie.
Atletica: Diamond League Oslo e Stoccolma Oslo: domani dalle 20:00 alle 22:00 in diretta su Rai Sport, Sky Sport Uno e Sky Sport Max Stoccolma: domenica dalle 18:00 alle 20:00 in diretta su Rai Sport e Sky Sport Max[Vai su X]
A Oslo il debutto di Zaynab Dosso, quattro italiani in Diamond League[Vai su Facebook]
Diamond League 2025, Bislett Games a Oslo: italiani e italiane in gara, programma e dove vederli in azione √Ç¬∑ Atletica; Diamond League, i meeting di Oslo e Stoccolma su Sky; Gioved√É¬¨ Diamond League ad Oslo: torna la Dosso! Sfide, italiani, orari e dove vederla in TV.
Diamond League, i meeting di Oslo e Stoccolma su Sky Scrive sport.sky.it: Due grandi meeting di Diamond League live su Sky e in streaming su NOW: gioved√¨ 12 giugno i Bislett Games a Oslo, domenica 15 appuntamento a Stoccolma.

author: infosalus
title: Sanidad #PorElClima reconoce a los 10 hospitales espa√±oles m√°s comprometidos con la acci√≥n clim√°tica
text: MADRID 7 Nov. (EUROPA PRESS) - Sanidad #PorElClima ha entregado este mi√©rcoles los reconocimientos a los 10 hospitales espa√±oles que mejores iniciativas han puesto en marcha en su compromiso con la acci√≥n clim√°tica y el camino a seguir para reducir su huella de carbono y alcanzar la neutralidad de emisiones para el a√±o 2050. Los Premios Sanidad #PorElClima son un proyecto de la Comunidad #PorElClima, una plataforma que a√∫na a varios actores del sector sanitario, y cuentan con el apoyo de la compa√±√≠a biofarmac√©utica GSK. Tienen como objetivo visibilizar la acci√≥n de los centros hospitalarios que ya est√°n actuando seg√∫n el acuerdo de Glasgow e impulsar las propuestas m√°s ambiciosas en materia de descarbonizaci√≥n que sirvan de ejemplo a otros hospitales. Los centros premiados han sido el Hospital √Ålvaro Cunqueiro de Vigo gracias a su iniciativa 'Autonom√≠a energ√©tica y mejora de la sostenibilidad', por la que ha instalado 5.422 paneles solares que generar√°n entre el 20 y 25 por ciento de su energ√≠a, lo que evitar√° la emisi√≥n de 1.500 toneladas de CO2 al a√±o. El Cl√≠nico Universitario Virgen de la Arrixaca (Murcia) ha sido seleccionado por su programa de econom√≠a circular aplicado en la lavader√≠a hospitalaria en 2023, con el que ha logrado, entre otros, reducir un 50 por cineot el uso de agua. La sustituci√≥n de 10 veh√≠culos di√©sel por otros el√©ctricos ha otorgado el galard√≥n al Hospital de Guadalajara, mientras que la 'Receta Energ√≠a' que destina el ahorro econ√≥mico conseguido con la instalaci√≥n de placas fotovoltaicas a cubrir parte de las facturas de luz de pacientes vulnerables ha servido para reconocer al Hospital San Juan de Dios del Aljarafe (Sevilla). El Hospital Santa Marina (Vizcaya) ha sido elegido por su iniciativa 'Control Monitorizado de la Caldera de Biomasa' y el Hospital Santa Tecla Llevant (Tarragona) por 'Descarbonizando nuestros centros', que incluye el uso de energ√≠a cien por cien renovable, la instalaci√≥n de placas fotovoltaicas o la sustituci√≥n de luminarias por LED. Tambi√©n se ha premiado al Hospital Universitario Cl√≠nico San Cecilio (Granada) por 'M√°s All√° de la Gesti√≥n Ambiental Hospitalaria', que incluye adem√°s de medidas t√©cnicas en el propio centro, la formaci√≥n ambiental de profesionales o cuentos educativos para ni√±os hospitalizados; al Hospital Universitario Nuestra Se√±ora de Candelaria (Tenerife) por 'Tratamiento In Situ Innovador de Residuos Clase III'; al Hospital Universitario Ram√≥n y Cajal (Madrid) por 'Farmacia Hospitalaria SoStenible'; y al Hospital Viamed Santa Elena por 'Planta de Biog√°s'. El acto de reconocimiento se ha cerrado poniendo de manifiesto que el sector sanitario espa√±ol ya est√° tomando medidas significativas en la lucha contra el cambio clim√°tico, pero es necesario continuar movilizando, as√≠ como es imprescindible formar a profesionales sanitarios y visibilizar acciones en todos los niveles para avanzar en la sostenibilidad del sector.

author: CBC
title: ‚ÄòThere‚Äôs been some tears‚Äô: storm and flood-hit Queensland town battles heatwave as more wild weather forecast
text:
The Guardian ‚ÄòThere‚Äôs been some tears‚Äô: storm and flood-hit Queensland town battles heatwave as more wild weather forecast Read full article Benita Kolovos December 29, 2023 at 4:00 p.m. ¬∑ 4 min read Photograph: Dave Hunt/AAP Inside an unassuming hall in Jimboomba, north-west of Queensland‚Äôs Gold Coast, Sarah Weir is offering a reprieve from the heat , cool drinks and food, wifi, and even her shoulder to cry on.
‚ÄúThere‚Äôs been some tears,‚Äù she says.
‚ÄúBut at the same time, I wouldn‚Äôt want to be anywhere else during a disaster.‚Äù
The town is one of several in south-east Queensland that was battered by storms and flash flooding over Christmas and Boxing Day . Seven people died, hundreds of homes were damaged and power outages affected thousands more. Now, residents are sweltering through a heatwave, many without the comfort of fans or air conditioning due to the lack of electricity .
Related: Queensland power supply to face strain as heatwave sends demand to near-record levels
According to the Bureau of Meteorology , more storms are forecast to hit the region on Saturday, with the possibility of destructive winds, large hail and heavy rain which may lead to flash flooding from the late morning.
As of Friday afternoon, 27,400 properties across the south-east were yet to have their power restored, including almost 2,000 in Jimboomba, where temperatures soared to 38C.
When Weir learned the Jimboomba Community and District Hall had power, she asked the local Rotary club if she could transform it into a makeshift shelter for those without. Since then, hundreds have been through its doors.
‚ÄúSome people are just popping into grab some food and water and a bit of reprieve from the heat, others are staying most of the day,‚Äù she says.
Weir says the majority of people who have visited the hall have been older residents escaping the heat as well as some families with small children, whose homes have been significantly damaged by the storm.
Others have taken advantage of the hall‚Äôs wifi to make contact with friends and family abroad during the festive season.
‚ÄúPeople have got family interstate or overseas they haven‚Äôt been able to contact to let them know they‚Äôre OK,‚Äù Weir says.
Story continues Queensland‚Äôs minister for disaster recovery, Nikki Boyd, visited Jimboomba on Friday and said it was one of the ‚Äúhardest hit‚Äù by the ‚Äúferocious‚Äù storms.
‚ÄúWe‚Äôve got field crews who are working right now across the clock to restore power as soon as possible,‚Äù she said.
Boyd said she was confident 90% of properties in the area would have electricity restored by New Year‚Äôs Eve but the remaining 10% of properties ‚Äì predominantly in Jimboomba and Tamborine Mountain ‚Äì could have a longer wait.
‚ÄúNetwork restoration there will take some time. Energex aims to have power restored to all customers in these communities ‚Ä¶ by tomorrow [Saturday] night,‚Äù she said.
‚ÄòShocked at the extent of the damage‚Äô Joshua Kerswill from Energex described the storm as unprecedented for the region.
‚ÄúThe scale that we‚Äôre dealing with here in the south-east to me is probably equivalent to twice what Cyclone Yasi put out,‚Äù he said of the 2011 disaster that left 150,000 homes without electricity.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs widespread, it‚Äôs covered a large populated area. Everyone working here is quite shocked at the extent of the damage.‚Äù
Logan city councillor Scott Bannan said he expected the clean-up would take months and urged residents not to overexert themselves in the heat.
‚ÄúThe clean-up can wait,‚Äù he said.
‚ÄúEspecially the older guys, I‚Äôm really worried about them overdoing it with the clean-up when it‚Äôs so hot outside and there‚Äôs no reprieve inside.‚Äù
Related: ‚ÄòRoaring like the ocean‚Äô: campers survey aftermath of Victorian flash flood that left two dead
He said the community had worked together to clear fallen trees and other debris from driveways to ensure people were able to leave their properties, and were now working to clear the main roads.
‚ÄúThe community is terrific. For some people who have just moved into the area, it has come as a bit of a shock but for those of us who have been here for a while ‚Äì it‚Äôs just a matter of getting shit done,‚Äù he said.
‚ÄúWhether its fires or floods ‚Äì neighbours here roll up their sleeves, they help each other, share machines. You really do see the best in people.‚Äù
Bannon said he had organised a barbecue for Friday afternoon as a thank you to the community. With some help from Weir, temporary washing machines and showers were set up and 500 sausages, 200 steaks and ‚Äúa little bit of salad‚Äù were distributed.
‚ÄúI‚Äôve been feeling a bit useless because I broke my leg, I‚Äôve been hopping around on crutches trying to help but not really [been able to] so I organised a barbecue. It‚Äôll be a big feed and an hour off for a bit of a breather,‚Äù he said.
Woodhill rural fire station was also allowing members of the public to use their bathrooms, while Bannan said people with power had opened up their homes for people to shower, store medication and charge phones.
Boyd urged locals to pay attention to warnings as more wild weather approaches.
‚ÄúWe‚Äôre not too sure exactly what the storms will bring at us,‚Äù she said.
‚ÄúBut one thing I know for sure is we‚Äôve got the best response.‚Äù
TRENDING 1. Woman sues dentist after 4 root canals, 8 dental crowns and 20 fillings in a single visit 2. Police visited couple days before they were shot to death in Caledon. Their son wants to know why 3. A broken pelvis, a severed vein and a holiday ruined 4. B.C. trucker found dead 4 days after completing delivery in Winnipeg, family friend says 5. Councillor must apologize and pay $500 fine or resign, says P.E.I. minister

author: Alicia Miyashiro
title: Tempo volta a ficar firme neste fim de semana em MS
text:
Os sul mato-grossenses j√° podem ficar aliviados, neste s√°bado (12) e domingo (13) o tempo volta a ficar mais firme com predom√≠nio de sol, varia√ß√£o de nebulosidade aliado ao tempo mais quente. De acordo com o Centro de Monitoramento do Tempo e do Clima de Mato Grosso do Sul (Cemtec).
Em Campo Grande, as m√≠nimas variam entre 19-21¬∞C e m√°ximas entre 29-32¬∞C, j√° os ventos atuam entre quadrante leste e sul com valores entre 30-50 km/h e, pontualmente, podem ocorrer rajadas de vento acima de 50 km/h.
Nas demais regi√µes do estado, as temperaturas estar√£o em gradativa eleva√ß√£o, com valores entre 34-37¬∞C aliado a baixos √≠ndices de umidade relativa do ar, entre 20-40%. Por√©m, n√£o se descartam pancadas de chuvas e tempestades isoladas.
S√°bado
- Bonito: m√≠n. 16¬∞C - m√°x. 30¬∞C
- Corumb√°: m√≠n. 19¬∞C - m√°x. 37¬∞C
- Dourados: m√≠n. 16¬∞C - m√°x. 25¬∞C
- Tr√™s Lagos: m√≠n. 21¬∞C - m√°x. 31¬∞C
- Ponta Por√£: m√≠n. 15¬∞C - m√°x. 29¬∞C
Domingo
- Bonito, MS: m√≠n. 19¬∞C - m√°x. 34¬∞C
- Corumb√°: m√≠n. 21¬∞C - m√°x. 38¬∞C
- Dourados, MS: m√≠n. 16¬∞C - m√°x. 31¬∞C
- Tr√™s Lagos, MS: m√≠n. 20¬∞C - m√°x. 34¬∞C
- Ponta Por√£: m√≠n. 16¬∞C - m√°x. 32¬∞C
Al√©m disso, uma frente fria oce√¢nica favorece a forma√ß√£o de instabilidade no estado de Mato Grosso do Sul.
Em rela√ß√£o √†s temperaturas s√£o previstas m√≠nimas entre 16-19¬∞C e m√°ximas entre 21-28¬∞C para as regi√µes sul, leste e sudeste do estado. Nas regi√µes pantaneira e sudoeste esperam-se m√≠nimas entre 19-24¬∞C e m√°ximas entre 26-28¬∞C. J√° nas regi√µes do bols√£o e norte s√£o esperadas m√≠nimas entre 22-24¬∞C e m√°ximas entre 30-34¬∞C.
A situa√ß√£o meteorol√≥gica ocorre devido a atua√ß√£o de um sistema de alta press√£o atmosf√©rica. O grande destaque √© a eleva√ß√£o gradativa das temperaturas, podendo atingir os 34¬∞C aliado a baixos valores de umidade relativa do ar, com valores entre 20-40%.
Devido a estes casos, recomenda-se que a popula√ß√£o hidrate-se frequentemente, evite exposi√ß√£o ao sol nos hor√°rios mais quentes e secos do dia e umidifique os ambientes.
**Colaborou Alanis Netto**

author: Delia Echavarri
title: Las oposiciones con m√°s plazas en Espa√±a: sueldos que alcanzan los 2.000 euros mensuales
text:
Cada vez es m√°s frecuente que muchas personas piensen en realizar unas oposiciones . La estabilidad laboral, una de las prioridades de los millennials , aumenta la motivaci√≥n para conseguir una plaza como funcionario. Sin embargo, n o es una tarea f√°cil , ya que implica muchas horas delante de los apuntes, renunciar a compromisos sociales , a ocio y a no estar presente en algunas ocasiones especiales.
El camino del opositor requiere constancia, sacrificio y mucha memoria para recordar todo el temario necesario. Unos lo hacen por vocaci√≥n y otros por encontrar en ellas el modo de tener una estabilidad econ√≥mica, pero todas implican trabajo. Eso s√≠, unas m√°s que otras.
Adem√°s, algunas, por las plazas que ofrecen anualmente, resultan m√°s atractivas para los espa√±oles. Seg√∫n GoKoan, una herramienta digital de ense√±anza y aprendizaje, las oposiciones con m√°s plazas disponibles a√±o tras a√±o son las que pertenecen a la categor√≠a de Administraci√≥n y Tramitaci√≥n Judicial ,ya que se convocan en diversos √°mbitos. En concreto, una de las que m√°s plazas oferta anualmente es la del Cuerpo de Auxilio Judicial , cuyo programa son 28 temas .
Fututos funcionarios examin√°ndose. EFE.
El examen para Auxiliar Judicial consta de un cuestionario de 100 preguntas tipo test y la resoluci√≥n de dos casos pr√°cticos. Adem√°s, solo se necesita la Educaci√≥n Secundaria Obligatoria (ESO) para presentarse.
El sueldo puede variar entre los 1.500 y los 2.000 euros brutos . Se estima que la preparaci√≥n para los Cuerpos de Tramitaci√≥n Procesal y Auxilio Judicial es de entre 6 a 12 meses . Los funcionarios que ejercen en √©l son los encargados de apoyar de forma directa a los Cuerpos de Gesti√≥n y Tramitaci√≥n Procesal.
[Las oposiciones que te puedes sacar estudiando seis meses: sueldos de hasta 2.000 euros al mes]
En cualquiera de los casos, hay que tener claro que, aunque se ofrezcan m√°s plazas, realmente no existe ninguna oposici√≥n que pueda asegurarse que es 'sencilla' , ya que en todas es necesario un gran esfuerzo y muchas horas de estudio .
Adem√°s, en este tipo de ex√°menes tampoco se puede garantizar el aprobado a pesar de una gran dedicaci√≥n para obtener el mejor de los resultados. De hecho, el simple hecho de que se convoquen m√°s plazas implica que se presentar√°n m√°s personas , y por lo tanto, elevar√° la dificultad de acceso.
Sigue los temas que te interesan Educaci√≥n Empleo Espa√±a Oposiciones

author: BVM Sportsdesk
title: Former Lady Lion Scholvin Achieves Historic Military Honor
text:
Former Lady Lion Scholvin Achieves Historic Military Honor
Jaclyn Schovlin, a former
Southeastern Louisiana University women's basketball player, has made history by becoming the first woman from Louisiana to complete the Infantry Basic Officer Leadership Course at Fort Moore, Georgia. After five months of rigorous training, she received her blue cord on September 3, signifying her status as an infantry-qualified soldier in the U.S. Army. Scholvin, who played for the Lady Lions from 2015-2019, expressed her gratitude for this achievement and her commitment to service, reflecting on the journey that led her there and honoring her parents' legacy.
- Scholvin played in 101 games, with 45 starts, averaging 5.4 points per game and 106 steals throughout her career.
- In her final season, she started all 28 games, averaging 10.2 points, 3.0 assists, and 1.7 steals per game.
While Scholvin's achievement is groundbreaking, the path for women in military leadership remains challenging. Scholvin's experience highlights ongoing issues of gender representation in the Army, where such milestones can still be met with resistance.State of Play
- Scholvin is returning to full-time duty with the National Guard, with a deployment scheduled for early next year.
- She aims to leverage her military training to make a positive impact in her local community.
Scholvin's future endeavors may include further leadership roles within the National Guard or military, potentially inspiring more women to pursue careers in the armed forces. Her deployment could also lead to opportunities for service and community engagement at a broader level.Bottom Line
Jaclyn Scholvin's success as a groundbreaking female soldier underscores the importance of representation in the military and sports, showing that dedication and service can lead to remarkable achievements. Her journey illustrates how personal accomplishments can resonate beyond individual success, fostering inspiration and change for future generations.
Read more at
 Southeastern Louisiana University Athletics
The summary of the linked article was generated with the assistance of artificial intelligence technology from OpenAI

author: Blake Reynolds
title: Nostradamus' worrying prediction about the future of Pope Francis resurfaces after his health problems | Marca
text:
T he health of Pope Francis keeps the faithful of the Catholic Church on alert and after being in delicate health, a prediction of Nostradamus came to light.
Although Michel de Nostradamus died in 1566, his book known as 'The Prophecies' is related to many events of today, one of them is believed to come from the revelation of the critical state of health of Pope Francis.
Watch the shocking moment US Navy jet crashes into San Diego Bay Many believe that Nostradamus already spoke in his writings about the possibility of the death of an elderly pontiff, pointing out that "by the death of a very old pontiff, a Roman of good age will be elected, of whom it will be said that he weakens his seat, but for a long time he will be seated and in biting activity"
The French astrologer is also believed to have suggested who his possible successor would be by pointing out that the next pontiff will be the last before the end of the world, as there will be a religious war in the world
"The Roman pontiff will not be elected, neither near nor far will attention be paid to him. A young man of dark skin with the help of the great king will deliver the purse to another of red color," wrote Nostradamus in his book.
Pope Francis still on oxygen The Vatican gave a report on the Pope's health, in which it was reported that he has rested, but has to continue with oxygen supplied through nasal cannulas, after suffering a respiratory crisis.
"The night passed quietly, the pope rested," said Vatican spokesman Matteo Bruni in a statement, in which he said that he was conscious, but still receiving large amounts of oxygen, after the crisis for which he also required blood transfusions, so he remains in critical condition from a complex lung infection.
The 88-year-old Argentine, who had part of a lung removed when he was young, will still have more clinical tests and later there will be an update on his health.

author: eduardo.reyes
title: Estos son los 5 peores antojos callejeros de M√©xico, seg√∫n Taste Atlas
text:
Los peores antojos callejeros de M√©xico no se definen solo por el sabor, sino por lo que ocurre detr√°s del mismo, o al menos eso es lo que dice la Gu√≠a Gastron√≥mica Taste Atlas.
Este recuento no pretende ofender tradiciones ni oficios, pero s√≠ pone en pol√©mica esas comidas que, por descuido o abuso, cruzan la l√≠nea entre lo antojable y lo innecesario, Taste atlas dio la justificaci√≥n de por qu√© son considerados los peores, pero en M√©xico, son de las m√°s amadas.
¬øCu√°les son los peores antojitos mexicanos?
Como ya lo mencionamos, esta lista est√° hecha por la gu√≠a Taste Atlas, misma que ha puesto en primer lugar a las carnitas como el mejor platillo hecho con carne de puerco en todo el mundo.
- Torta de tamal: es un bolillo que envuelve un tamal reci√©n salido de la vaporera, creando una combinaci√≥n densa que llena sin gastar mucho. Es t√≠pica en las ma√±anas capitalinas y se acompa√±a con atole. A pesar de lo sencilla, tiene un peso cultural importante en el desayuno urbano. Para Taste Atlas la combinaci√≥n de carbohidratos hacen que sea el n√∫mero uno en la lista.
- Torta cubana: aunque no tiene relaci√≥n con Cuba, s√≠ tiene relaci√≥n con el exceso, son capas de jam√≥n, milanesa, salchicha, huevo y queso se apilan dentro de un pan que apenas las contiene. La mayonesa, el jitomate y el aguacate completan este cl√°sico de loncher√≠a, la explicaci√≥n de Taste Atlas es que la mezcla de embutidos no tiene sentido.
- Tacos de frijol con queso: b√°sicamente es una tortilla dorada a la plancha, se unta con frijoles refritos y se cubre con queso rallado que a veces se funde con el calor. Es un antojito econ√≥mico y b√°sicos, la gu√≠a no dio explicaci√≥n del porqu√© aparece en su lista.
- Tacos de tripas:
las tripas de reso cerdo se limpian, cuecen y luego se fr√≠en hasta quedar crujientes por fuera, suaves por dentro. Se sirven en tortilla chica con cebolla, cilantro y salsa picante. El exceso de grasa fue el motivo de que aparecieran en esta lista. - Tamales de chipil√≠n: son originarios del sureste, se elaboran con masa de ma√≠z mezclada con hojas frescas de chipil√≠n, una planta con sabor herbal muy marcado. Est√°n en la lista porque a la gu√≠a no le gust√≥ el sabor de la planta.
¬øQu√© son y por qu√© son famosos los antojitos callejeros mexicanos?
Los antojos callejeros mexicanos son preparaciones r√°pidas que se venden en puestos ambulantes, esquinas, carritos o locales peque√±os.
Surgen de recetas populares que se adaptan a lo cotidiano y de la necesidad de tener buenos alimentos a precios relativamente bajos, se hacen ingredientes accesibles, t√©cnicas caseras y porciones suficientes para saciar a la gente que sale a trabajar o no quiere cocinar.
Su objetivo no es ser sofisticados, pero s√≠ sabrosos y muy abundantes. Son famosos porque representan el d√≠a a d√≠a de millones de personas, en cada ciudad, colonia o barrio hay una versi√≥n diferente de los mismos antojitos, lo que refleja la riqueza cultural del pa√≠s.
Adem√°s, su preparaci√≥n al momento con vapor, planchas o comales los vuelve irresistibles para cualquiera que pase cerca.
Ahora sabes cu√°les son los 5 peores antojos mexicanos seg√∫n la gu√≠a gastron√≥mica de Taste Atlas, aunque para ellos no son buenos, para la gran mayor√≠a de los mexicanos son una aut√©ntica delicia.

author: Adrien Genevi√®ve-Anastasie

text: iPhone 13 reconditionn√© : Un bon plan √©co-responsable √† moins de 470 eurosbon plan‚Ä¢Pas besoin de se ruiner dans le dernier smartphone d‚ÄôApple pour obtenir un mod√®le r√©cent et performant.
